monkeyPatch.folderMap.title: Folder map
monkeyPatch.folderMap.markdownDescription:
Maps root package name to a folder on disk.

For example:

 ```
{
 "mypackage" : "~/.vscode/mypackage/"
}
```
 means `require('mypackage/module')` will reference ~/.vscode/mypackage/module.js

monkeyPatch.mainProcessModules.title: Main process modules
monkeyPatch.mainProcessModules.markdownDescription:
Name of modules to be loaded in VSCode main process.

The modules root packages need to be declared in `monkeyPatch.folderMap`.

monkeyPatch.browserModules.title: Browser modules
monkeyPatch.browserModules.markdownDescription:
Name of modules to be loaded in VSCode browser process.

The modules root packages need to be declared in `monkeyPatch.folderMap`.
